text: Saa da no, wobekurukyerɛw asɛm a ɛka se: KRONKRON MA Awurade14.20 KRONKRON MA Awurade: Eyi yɛ nsɛm a wɔatwa agu sikakɔkɔɔ apampaa so de abɔ ɔsɔfopanyin no abotiri anim (2 Mose 28.36-38) a ɛde kae no sɛ wɔayɛ no kronkron ama Awurade adwumayɛ. wɔ nnɔnnɔmma a ɛsensɛn apɔnkɔ kɔn mu ho, na nkuku a wɔde noa aduan wɔ Awurade fi no bɛyɛ sɛ nkuruwa kronkron a esisi afɔremuka anim.
